Html:
hello,

maybe it is a good argument for a new chapter?
compare TFS with other SCM.
it's almost impossible to find any information regarding the differences between all the SCM.

My company is using Starteam for all the delphi source, but our new projects are build within visual studio.
I cannot find any information to convince them to use TFS :(

Does any of u have information Why to choose TFS above Starteam?

Greetings,
Raymond
